skillInfo.passive: Lukas gains 1 Resolve per second and an additional 2 Resolve when dealing damage to heroes.Lukas consumes 10 Resolve per second while in [Sacred Beast] form.
skillInfo.skill_1_description: Passive: Lukas can enhance Flash Combo with his Basic Attacks up to 2 times, lasting 4s.Lukas consumes all Vigor to unleash Pulverize, dealing 270 (+120% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage, plus additional attacks depending on the Vigor consumed (recovers HP equal to 8% of Max HP when hitting a hero)1 Stack: Lukas briefly stuns the target and spins his tonfa hammers to deal 100 (+50% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage 3 times, pulling the enemy toward him.2 Stacks: Lukas briefly stuns the target and follows up with 2 attacks that deal 50 (+20% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage per hit. He will then spin his tonfa hammers to deal 100 (+50% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage 3 times (cannot be interrupted).
skillInfo.skill_2_description: Passive: Lukas can enhance Flash Combo with his Basic Attacks up to 2 times, lasting 4s.Lukas consumes all Vigor to unleash a tail swing, dealing 270 (+120% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage, plus additional attacks depending on the Vigor consumed, he also recovers 8% of his Max HP.1 Stack: Lukas briefly stuns the target and pounces to deal 100 (+50% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage 3 times, knocking the enemy back.2 Stacks: Lukas briefly stuns the target and leaps to deal 50 (+20% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage 2 times. then summons sacred lightning, dealing 100 (+50% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage 3 times (cannot be interrupted).
skillInfo.skill_3_description: Lukas dashes in the target direction and turns his next Basic Attack within 4s into Flash StrikeFlash Strike: Lukas blinks behind the enemy, dealing 60 (+125% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage. He then increases his Attack Range, gains 20% Movement Speed and 20% Attack Speed, and summons lightning storms with Basic Attacks to deal 40 (+25% Total Physical Attack) extra Physical Damage, lasting for 4s.
